DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Grid Axes
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation:
Provision of the grid axis information as 2 or 3 lists of grid lines. Each list reflects an ordered collection of grid lines of the u--axis and v-axis (in case of triangular grids also a w-axis).
The grid lines references have to be included in the 'FootPrint' shape representation. A tag (or number / letter) can be assigned to each grid line.
A grid line may either be
* a bounded line * a bounded arc * a circle
